Contributor: United States. Dept. of the Treasury, publisher.; United States. Government Printing Office., printer.;
Note: Date based on America's participation in the war. "S5" appears on the bottom left of poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Poster says to buy war savings stamps for victory. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
